languages.text: "Мы в преддверии Камеры Патента — святая святых этого корабля. Там, за этими вратами, хранится реликвия, которая дает Теодоре всю ее власть — священный {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Торговый Патент{/g}. Есть только одна загвоздка — врата Камеры охраняет древнее устройство, которое откроет двери только истинному наследнику династии. Я рассчитывал справиться сам, но... неважно. Кровь Стражу поднесешь ты".

traits.locale_text: "Мы в преддверии Камеры Патента — святая святых этого корабля. Там, за этими вратами, хранится реликвия, которая дает Теодоре всю ее власть — священный {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Торговый Патент{/g}. Есть только одна загвоздка — врата Камеры охраняет древнее устройство, которое откроет двери только истинному наследнику династии. Я рассчитывал справиться сам, но... неважно. Кровь Стражу поднесешь ты".

languages.text: "We are in the anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this voidship's most hallowed vault. There, beyond those gates, lies the relic that gives Theodora all of her power — the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}. Only one obstacle remains on my path to obtaining it — the gates to the Chamber are guarded by the Sentinel, an ancient device that will only open the door to a true heir of the dynasty. I expected to do this part myself, but... never mind. You will offer your blood to the Sentinel."
languages.original_text: "Мы в преддверии Камеры Патента — святая святых этого корабля. Там, за этими вратами, хранится реликвия, которая дает Теодоре всю ее власть — священный {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Торговый Патент{/g}. Есть только одна загвоздка — врата Камеры охраняет древнее устройство, которое откроет двери только истинному наследнику династии. Я рассчитывал справиться сам, но... неважно. Кровь Стражу поднесешь ты".

traits.locale_text: "The anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this ship's most hallowed vault. There, beyond those gates, lies the relic that gives Theodora all of her power — the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}, blessed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} himself. The moment I use it to conduct a short yet carefully prepared ritual, I will become a Rogue Trader myself, one who serves forces far greater than the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}! Defiling such a relic will grant me power that will make all of Theodora's might pale in comparison!"

"The anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this ship's most hallowed vault. There, beyond those gates, lies the relic that gives Theodora all of her power — the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}, blessed by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} himself. The moment I use it to conduct a short yet carefully prepared ritual, I will become a Rogue Trader myself, one who serves forces far greater than the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}! Defiling such a relic will grant me power that will make all of Theodora's might pale in comparison!"

"We are in the anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this voidship's most hallowed vault. There, beyond those gates, lies the relic that gives Theodora all of her power — the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}. Only one obstacle remains on my path to obtaining it — the gates of the Chamber are guarded by the Sentinel, an ancient device that will only open the door to a true heir of the dynasty. I expected to handle it myself, but... never mind. You will bring your blood to the Sentinel."

"We are in the anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this voidship's most hallowed vault. There, beyond those gates, lies the relic that gives Theodora all of her power — the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}. Only one obstacle remains on my path to obtaining it — the gates of the Chamber are guarded by the Sentinel, an ancient device that will only open the door to a true heir of the dynasty. I expected to do this part myself, but... never mind. You will offer your blood to the Sentinel."

"We are in the anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this voidship's most hallowed vault. I expected to do this part myself, but... never mind. You will offer your blood to the Sentinel."

languages.text: “我们所在的地方，是授状大厅的前厅，也是这艘虚空舰最神圣的居所。在那里，在那扇大门之后，存放着神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易授状{/g}，西奥多拉所有权力都源自那张授状。通往它的道路目前只剩下一个障碍。这间大厅的大门由哨兵把守，那是个古老的装置，只有王朝真正的继承人才能打开这扇大门。我本希望能自己完成这个步骤，不过……没关系，你可以将你的鲜血献给哨兵。”
languages.original_text: "We are in the anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this voidship's most hallowed vault. There, beyond those gates, lies the relic that gives Theodora all of her power — the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}. Only one obstacle remains on my path to obtaining it — the gates to the Chamber are guarded by the Sentinel, an ancient device that will only open the door to a true heir of the dynasty. I expected to do this part myself, but... never mind. You will offer your blood to the Sentinel."

traits.locale_text: “我们所在的地方，是许可证大厅的前厅，也是这艘虚空舰最神圣的居所。在那里，在那扇大门之后，存放着神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易许可证{/g}，西奥多拉所有权力都源自那张许可证。通往它的道路目前只剩下一个障碍。这间大厅的大门由哨兵把守，那是个古老的装置，只有王朝真正的继承人才能打开这扇大门。我本希望能自己完成这个步骤，不过……没关系，你可以将你的鲜血献给哨兵。”

languages.text: «Estamos en la antesala de la sala de la Patente, la cámara más sagrada de esta nave. Ahí, al otro lado de esas puertas, se encuentra la reliquia que confiere todo su poder a Theodora: la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente de Comercio{/g}. El único obstáculo que se interpone en mi camino hasta ella es el centinela que guarda las puertas de la sala, un dispositivo ancestral que solo permite el paso a los auténticos herederos de la dinastía. Esperaba encargarme de esta parte yo mismo, pero... no importa. Ofrecerás tu sangre al centinela».
languages.original_text: "We are in the anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this voidship's most hallowed vault. There, beyond those gates, lies the relic that gives Theodora all of her power — the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}. Only one obstacle remains on my path to obtaining it — the gates to the Chamber are guarded by the Sentinel, an ancient device that will only open the door to a true heir of the dynasty. I expected to do this part myself, but... never mind. You will offer your blood to the Sentinel."

traits.locale_text: «Estamos en la antesala de la sala de la Patente, la cámara más sagrada de esta nave. Ahí, al otro lado de esas puertas, se encuentra la reliquia que confiere todo su poder a Theodora: la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente de Comercio{/g}. El único obstáculo que se interpone en mi camino hasta ella es el centinela que guarda las puertas de la sala, un dispositivo ancestral que solo permite el paso a los auténticos herederos de la dinastía. Esperaba encargarme de esta parte yo mismo, pero... no importa. Ofrecerás tu sangre al centinela».

languages.text: 「私たちはこのヴォイドシップの最も神聖な金庫、令状部屋の前室にいる。その門の向こうには、シオドーラ様にすべての力を与える遺物、つまり聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}通商許可証{/g}がある。私がそれを手に入れるために残された唯一の障害は、センチネルによって守られたこの部屋の門だ。この古代の装置は、王朝の真の後継者だけに門を開く。私はこの部分を自分で行うつもりだったんだが…まあいい。お前はセンチネルに血を捧げるのだ」
languages.original_text: "We are in the anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this voidship's most hallowed vault. There, beyond those gates, lies the relic that gives Theodora all of her power — the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}. Only one obstacle remains on my path to obtaining it — the gates to the Chamber are guarded by the Sentinel, an ancient device that will only open the door to a true heir of the dynasty. I expected to do this part myself, but... never mind. You will offer your blood to the Sentinel."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは令状部屋の前室…このヴォイドシップの最も神聖な金庫にいる。その門の向こうには、テオドラにすべての力を与える遺物、つまり聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}貿易令状{/g}がある。それを手に入れるための、私の道には障害が一つだけ残っている。令状部屋の門は、王朝の真の後継者にのみ扉を開ける古代の装置センチネルによって保護されている。私はこの部分を自分で行うつもりだったんだが…よかろう。お前はセンチネルに血を捧げるのだ」

「私たちはこのヴォイドシップの最も神聖な金庫、令状部屋の前室にいる。その門の向こうには、シオドーラ様にすべての力を与える遺物、つまり聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}通商許可証{/g}がある。私がそれを手に入れるために残された唯一の障害は、センチネルによって守られたこの部屋の門だ。この古代の装置は、王朝の真の後継者だけに門を開く。私はこの部分を自分で行うつもりだったんだが…まあいい。お前はセンチネルに血を捧げるのだ」

languages.text: « Nous sommes dans l'antichambre de la salle abritant la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}, l'endroit le plus sacré de ce vaisseau. Au-delà de cette porte repose la relique qui confère son pouvoir à Théodora. Il ne me reste qu'un dernier obstacle à surmonter pour m'en emparer : cette porte est défendue par la sentinelle, un mécanisme antique qui l'ouvrira seulement à un authentique héritier de la dynastie. Je comptais pouvoir le faire moi-même, mais... Qu'importe. Vous allez offrir votre sang à la sentinelle. »
languages.original_text: "We are in the anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this voidship's most hallowed vault. There, beyond those gates, lies the relic that gives Theodora all of her power — the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}. Only one obstacle remains on my path to obtaining it — the gates to the Chamber are guarded by the Sentinel, an ancient device that will only open the door to a true heir of the dynasty. I expected to do this part myself, but... never mind. You will offer your blood to the Sentinel."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes dans l'antichambre de la salle abritant la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}, l'endroit le plus sacré de ce vaisseau. Au-delà de cette porte repose la relique qui confère son pouvoir à Théodora. Il ne me reste qu'un dernier obstacle à surmonter pour m'en emparer : cette porte est défendue par la sentinelle, un mécanisme antique qui l'ouvrira seulement à un authentique héritier de la dynastie. Je comptais pouvoir le faire moi-même, mais... Qu'importe. Vous allez offrir votre sang à la sentinelle. »

languages.text: "Wir befinden uns hier im Vorraum der Handelsbriefkammer – dem heiligsten Bereich dieses Raumschiffs. Dort hinter diesen Toren liegt das Relikt, das Theodora ihre gesamte Macht verleiht – der heilige {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g}. Nur ein Hindernis verhindert derzeit, dass ich ihn an mich nehme – die Tore der Kammer werden vom Wächter bewacht, einem uralten Gerät, das die Tür nur einem wahren Erben der Dynastie öffnet. Ich wollte das eigentlich selbst übernehmen, aber ... vergesst es. Ihr werdet dem Wächter Euer Blut anbieten."
languages.original_text: "We are in the anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this voidship's most hallowed vault. There, beyond those gates, lies the relic that gives Theodora all of her power — the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}. Only one obstacle remains on my path to obtaining it — the gates to the Chamber are guarded by the Sentinel, an ancient device that will only open the door to a true heir of the dynasty. I expected to do this part myself, but... never mind. You will offer your blood to the Sentinel."

Ich wollte das eigentlich selbst übernehmen, aber ... vergesst es. Ihr werdet dem Wächter Euer Blut anbieten."

I expected to do this part myself, but... never mind. You will offer your blood to the Sentinel."

languages.text: "Bu geminin en mukaddes dairesi olan Ruhsatname Odası'nın giriş salonundayız. Şu kapıların ardında, Theodora'ya bütün o kudretini veren yadigâr yatıyor: Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ticari Ruhsatname{/g}. Onu ele geçirmemin önünde de tek bir engel var. Oda'nın kapıları, onları sadece hanedanlığın gerçek vârislerine açan kadim bir cihaz olan Nöbetçi tarafından korunuyor. Bu kısmı kendim hallederim sanıyordum ama... Neyse. Kanını Nöbetçi'ye sunacaksın."
languages.original_text: "We are in the anteroom of the Warrant Chamber — this voidship's most hallowed vault. There, beyond those gates, lies the relic that gives Theodora all of her power — the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}. Only one obstacle remains on my path to obtaining it — the gates to the Chamber are guarded by the Sentinel, an ancient device that will only open the door to a true heir of the dynasty. I expected to do this part myself, but... never mind. You will offer your blood to the Sentinel."

Oda'nın kapıları, onları sadece hanedanlığın gerçek vârislerine açan kadim bir cihaz olan Nöbetçi tarafından korunuyor. Bu kısmı kendim hallederim sanıyordum ama... Neyse. Kanını Nöbetçi'ye sunacaksın."
